refnamediv.refpurpose: Lists all existing paths that start from the specified path_start and end at a primitive shape.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Lists all existing paths that start from the specified path_start and end at a primitive shape. The path_start may be specified by / separated components, or they may be separated by spaces (but not both).

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the paths command to list all existing paths that start from the specified path start and end at a primitive shape.

example.title: List all paths that start from a specified path start and end at a primitive shape.
example.para: Lists all existing paths that start from group1/region2 and end at a primitive shape.
